Junkyard Titan.name: Junkyard Titan
Junkyard Titan.blurb: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
Junkyard Titan.description: Heat: Rumble gains  Heat each time he uses a basic ability (20 for  Flamespitter, 20 for  Scrap Shield, 10 for  Electro Harpoon) and loses 10  Heat per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds.
Junkyard Titan.description2: Danger Zone: Rumble's basic abilities are enhanced when cast at/above 50  Heat.
Junkyard Titan.description3: Overheating: At 100  Heat, Rumble becomes Overheated,  silences himself for 6 seconds. While  silenced, his basic attacks deal 25 − 110 (based on level) (+ 30% AP)  bonus magic damage each while his  Heat decays back to 0 over the duration.
Junkyard Titan.notes:
* The enhanced attacks apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but do not affect structures.
 Rumble can use summoner spells and/or active ability items while  silenced.
 Even though he can use the summoner spell, he is unable to  cleanse the silence, neither can he reduce the silence's duration in any way.

Flamespitter.name: Flamespitter
Flamespitter.blurb: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
Flamespitter.description: Active: Rumble activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, granting 20  Heat and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him. Deals reduced damage to  minions.
Flamespitter.description2: Danger Zone: Flamespitter's damage is increased by 50%.
Flamespitter.notes:
* Flamespitter has no cast time and does not interrupt Rumble's previous orders.
 Rumble will instantly turn to face the cursor if he is not moving when Flamespitter is cast.
 Flamespitter is not canceled by self-stasis effects (e.g.  Stopwatch,  Zhonya's Hourglass).

Scrap Shield.name: Scrap Shield
Scrap Shield.blurb: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
Scrap Shield.description: Active: Rumble pulls up a  shield for 1.5 seconds.
Scrap Shield.description2: While shielding himself Rumble gains  bonus movement speed until the duration of the shield ends or the shield is broken.
Scrap Shield.description3: Danger Zone: Scrap Shield's effects are increased by 50%.
Scrap Shield.leveling3:
Enhanced Shield Strength:
120 / 165 / 210 / 255 / 300 (+ 75% AP)

Enhanced Bonus Movement Speed:
30 / 37.5 / 45 / 52.5 / 60%
Scrap Shield.notes: * Scrap Shield has no cast time and does not interrupt Rumble's previous orders (basic attack animation is canceled on-cast).

Electro Harpoon.name: Electro Harpoon
Electro Harpoon.blurb: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
Electro Harpoon.description: Passive: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Electro Harpoon.description2: Active: Rumble shoots a harpoon, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 2 seconds. Hitting the same target with another harpoon enhances the  slow (stacks additively).
Electro Harpoon.description3: Danger Zone: Electro Harpoon's effects are increased by 50%.
Electro Harpoon.leveling3:
Enhanced Magic Damage:
90 / 127.5 / 165 / 202.5 / 240 (+ 60% AP)
Total Enhanced Magic Damage:
180 / 255 / 330 / 405 / 480 (+ 120% AP)
Enhanced Slow:
22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 / 52.5%
Total Enhanced Slow:
45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105%
Electro Harpoon.notes:
* If Rumble casts Electro Harpoon before Overheating, he may still use another charge within three seconds of the initial cast.
 Each Electro Harpoon cast triggers  Sheen (and its upgrade)'s Spellblade and stacks  Force Pulse.

The Equalizer.name: The Equalizer
The Equalizer.blurb: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
The Equalizer.description: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets 1000 units down the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
The Equalizer.description2: Enemies within the line of rockets take magic damage every 0.5 seconds and are  slowed by 35%. After leaving the area the damage will linger for 1 second.
The Equalizer.leveling2:
Magic Damage Per Half-Second:
70 / 87.5 / 105 / 122.5 / 140 (+ 17.5% AP)
Maximum Magic Damage:
840 / 1050 / 1260 / 1470 / 1680 (+ 210% AP)
The Equalizer.notes: * The Equalizer is blocked by  Wind Wall and  Unbreakable. The line of rockets placed on the ground before being intercepted are not destroyed.
